title: WALTER LOCKNER Russian Constructivist Logo Font ID
content:
Looking for an ID or something similar to the 'Walther Lockner" font. Many thanks in advance for any helpful suggestions!

-Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014205406im_/http:/typophile.com/files/WALTER_LOCKNER_6057.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [WALTER\_LOCKNER.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014205406/http:/typophile.com/files/WALTER_LOCKNER.jpg) | 29.61 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content:
It must be Venus, a german sans font of the bauer foundry which was often used by pionners of new typography.  
it seems that there is not all the weight in digital.  
Look at the two first with this link  
 [http://www.linotype.com/fr/searchresult?subviewmode=FAMILIES&samplestr=WALTHER+LOCKNER](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014205406/http:/www.linotype.com/fr/searchresult?subviewmode=FAMILIES&samplestr=WALTHER+LOCKNER)
awesome thanks! venus sb bold extended is super close
